name: Grog Throws Rocks
description:
Grog is a happy guy who likes butterflies and bunnies. But he hates the big noisy birds. So Grog throws rocks at the planes.

The scenery and planes are by Synty Studios, Polygon Starter Pack.

The Rocks are by Broken Vector

Grog's fur structure was sculpted by Jammin Fredrick . [ The bugs in the fur are for snacking later.]

Sounds clips from Pixabay and Open Game Art.org

Spline solution provided by Catlike Coding. [Bezier Solution

Oculus hands - sorced from Joseph Barnett's  VR Guy site

Skin texture-  free skin pack, sourced  online

Fur - “material 05”,   free  game content site
